Responsible for new business development, account management, and sales execution.DIVERSANT LLC is a privately-held professional services firm providing IT contingent labor and consulting services to mid-market and Fortune 500 companies nationwide. Our firm combines a wealth of practical business expertise with decades of experience in the IT and staffing sectors.DIVERSANT’s proprietary sourcing methodologies help us accurately match highly-skilled candidates with our client's exacting business requirements. Our staffing solutions are complemented by consulting and payroll services which provide analytical insights and process controls respectively. DIVERSANT also develops and implements innovative programs that promote diversity in the workforce and the talent acquisition supply chain. We believe that diversity in all its forms leads to greater opportunities for consultants and partners, and to more innovative solutions for clients.At DIVERSANT, we are equally interested in developing the careers of our consultants by providing them the best possible opportunities at leading corporations. We complement this service by offering generous benefits packages commensurate with tenure. Consultants working with DIVERSANT find challenging projects where their industry specialization pays off.DIVERSANT LLC was formed when Diversant Inc. and Info Technologies merged in early 2010, thereby creating one of the largest African American-owned IT staffing solutions companies in the United States. The merge was part of a natural progression for both companies, which have been operating in close cooperation since 2005 when DIVERSANT Inc. was first founded.DIVERSANT stands behinds its people and has a 100% commitment to customer satisfaction.Please contact me to learn more about how our solutions can help you realize your objectives.

Responsible for identifying potential target contacts, calling and scheduling meetings and developing relationships to grow the Wells Fargo account baseAccountable for creating and expanding a key client contact organizational chartHeavy emphasis on selling IT staffing and consulting servicesPartner with the recruiting team to drive results and manage client relationshipsHeld accountable for personal production while contributing to the overall success of the business centerExpert in business to business sales selling IT staffing and services to Fortune 1000 large enterprise clientsProven experience expanding relationships and building headcount in a large enterprise accountCompetent in all aspects of the sales process; cold/warm calling, scheduling meetings, client presentations, gathering requirements and managing resultsExpert level skills in building relationships with new and existing clientsStrong communication and organizational skillsAbility to work in a fast-paced group and self-managed

Sales/Marketing-Generate profitable new business through prospecting and enquiry handling within the local market in order to exceed set targets-Drive and maximize service revenue through up-selling of variable services to new and existing customers-Conduct tours, with a goal of converting prospects into customers by effectively listening and selling the entire product range-Prospect to generate leads through local companies, partnerships and brokers -Effectively manage leads and continuously update CRM throughout the sales process to close of deal-Keep abreast of the local market by attending networking events and building strong channel relationships with commercial brokersOperations/Financial Management-Accountable for Centre profitability, Centre performance and the Centre’s success through P&L management-Drive revenue by effectively and consistently maximizing all service revenue-Effectively manage the renewal process working to retain every customer at a profitable margin-Focus on meeting Customer satisfaction and retention metrics, maintain and develop existing customer relationships-Ensure the center team is delivering exceptional customer service and customer’s needs are handled effectively and efficiently-Provide direction to center team to ensure there is a clear focus on delivering a 90+% customer satisfaction ratingKey Experience: -Proven success in a business-to-business sales environment-Experienced in self-generation of new business leads coupled with excellent account management skills-Ability to remain flexible and calm in high pressure or continually changing situations-Strong organizational skills, including the ability to prioritize, multi-task, and work effectively with minimal supervision-Professional communication skills with a high success rate in building and maintaining business relationships-Thorough knowledge of MS office; Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook
